name: Hugh
text: Hi, my name is Hugh. I grew up in a family of 6 on a small abandoned planet called Eilling 3.

name: Hugh
text: I spent my childhood on the small farm next to a small Cosmoport - the only gate from this planet into the Universe.

name: Hugh
text: But nobody really cares about the stars above, nobody except me...

name: Hugh
text: I'm sick of all this routine on the farm, hadn't ever found it even a bit interesting.

name: Hugh
text: I was staring at the sky the whole night and looking on the spacecrafts floating by our planet.

name: Hugh
text: They almost never landed on the planet, just floating by...

name: Hugh
text: One day I heard that our planet was gonna be visited by the Military Agency of Eternal Star Empire.

name: Hugh
text: They wanted to recruit new soliders. That hit me, that's my chance to leave this planet!

name: Hugh
text: Early in the morning I've come to the Cosmoport when the Agency came up.

name: Hugh
text: An hour later I was splitting the space together with a few another recruits on a board of the Military Agency spacecraft...

name: Officer
text: Ok, ok, stop f**cking my mind with your sweety stories! Now you're a SOLDIER of Eternal Star Empire!

name: Officer
text: So take up your ass and go to the spacecraft over there!

name: Vezie
text: Hi! I'm Vezie, your robotic instructor and assistant. I will help find out how this wingy bird is flying!

name: Vezie
text: Move your mouse to rotate your spacecraft!

name: Vezie
text: Press SPACE to move forward!

name: Vezie
text: Use the left mouse button to shoot!

name: Vezie
text: Perfect! Follow the red marker on the minimap!

name: Vezie
text: Brilliant! Move to another red marker on the minimap!

name: Vezie
text: Amazing! That's enough for the first time.

name: Officer
text: What's up soldier? I see you're getting better and better, but now get out of here and follow me, I have something special for you!

name: Officer
text: There's something great coming up, so hear me out!

name: Officer
text: 456 parsecs far from here there's a thing that we used to call the edge of the Universe.

name: Officer
text: It works like a big mirror of entire Universe, technicaly it's still a part of our Universe, but unusual one.

name: Officer
text: Everything that happens here happens on the other side as well.

name: Officer
text: Everybody and everything here has a twin on the other side, and the twins act and move right like we do.

name: Officer
text: Almost...

name: Officer
text: We have one difference. If we do nothing they're gonna endager entire universe to be destroyed in a term of a million years.

name: Officer
text: We have to stop this. That's why we started recruiting throughout all the Empire. We have to fight them.

name: Hugh
text: Yes, sir, but how are you going to fight them if they do everything just like we do?

name: Hugh
text: You couldn't even cross the border, you'll just crash into your twin!

name: Officer
text: Yeah, that's the right question. But we've got something special!

name: Officer
text: We've got a technology which allows us to teleport our fighters to the other side, without teleporting the twins.

name: Officer
text:
So than we can fight them.
And...

name: Officer
text: You will be one of the fighters that will be teleported to the other side!

name: Officer
text: You have to carry this mission, in the name of Empire and in the name of the Universe!

name: Officer
text: Fly your wheel into the Intergalactic Cruiser, we're taking off in 15 minutes!

name: Officer
text: SOLDIERS! Today you're here to protect our universe from beeing destroyed!

name: Officer
text: It's gonna be a very unusual fight.

name: Officer
text: But you have to hold the line even if fight with your own reflection in the mirror!

name: Officer
text: In the name of the Empire and for the future of our Universe!

name: Officer
text: All in places! We're taking of in a minute!
